channel.title: Dueling Dupe
channel.description: People are duping on my server by dueling, is there any way i can remove dueling, to stop this.

item.title: Dueling Dupe
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

this ones for 2)

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("setitem")
            && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) {
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                + " tried to set item and has been autobanned!");
        appendToBanned(playerName);
        disconnected = true;

try this i rip outta my source and replace noclip with set item and set item is in the client not the server

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling Dupe
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

there is a few.

1: People duel each other. Stake say a red mask. both accept one player hits report abuse, and he gets the items that the other person staked , and the person who stakes also gets them

2: Some1 mines copper and tin, and smelts to bronze bar. switchs to moparscape client and sets it to any item, and smiths. there is no ::setitem command in the server tho.

3: There is a bank dupe, but i am not familiar with it.

Read full topic
